alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henry, northwestern Clay and southern Quitman Counties through 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/... At 642 PM EDT/542 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Osco, or near Eufaula, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Georgetown, Days Crossroads, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Wire Bridge, Walter F George Lake, Bonapartes Retreat, Standleys Store, Otho, Watson Crossroads, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Moores Crossroads, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Garnersville, Coates, Bagby State Park, Thomas Mill Creek and Hatcher. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
